markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Eloko](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1429)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

If a biloko is lucky enough to consume several spellcasters or other creatures with innate magical abilities, they undergo a subtle transformation over the course of 1 week. Such a fey is known as an eloko, and in addition to their incredible appetite (even by biloko standards), they have the supernatural ability to grow to immense size.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Eloko](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1429)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 295 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 83</row>

**Perception** +15; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +15, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +5

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66) (10 poisoned darts), _+1 [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 115

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +16,
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
blowgun +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1 piercing plus 2d4 [persistent poison](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 22
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

**Inspired Feast**  ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) If a biloko feasts on a [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6) corpse for 1 minute or more, they gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 hour.

**Size Alteration** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The eloko is affected by a 4th-level [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) spell. This lasts for 1 minute, and the eloko can Dismiss the Spell.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The eloko deals 2d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-108" />
name: Eloko

Such a fey is known as an eloko, and in addition to their incredible appetite (even by biloko standards), they have the supernatural ability to grow to immense size.
